name: Topher Bullock
title: Effective Goroutine Cancellation
bio: Topher recently joined Shopify as a Staff Developer and is based out of their Toronto, Canada office. Shopify is a Canadian based e-commerce company whose mission to make commerce better for everyone and has helped 800,000 businesses sell $100B through the platform.
Topher has experience working on distributed systems, infrastructure automation, Concourse, Cloud Foundry, Service Broker APIs, and Mobile Apps.
In 2017, he was selected as one of Canada's Software Developer Top 30 Under 30.
